problem.p: What is the Reduced Redundancy option in Amazon S3?

choicegroup.choice: Less redundancy for a lower cost.
It doesn’t exist in Amazon S3, but in Amazon EBS.
It allows you to destroy any copy of your files outside a specific jurisdiction.

problem.p: While creating an Amazon RDS DB, your first task is to set up a DB ______ that controls what IP addresses or EC2 instances have access to your DB Instance.
All Amazon EC2 instances are assigned two IP addresses at launch, out of which one can only be reached from within the Amazon EC2 network?
Every user you create in the IAM system starts with _________.
What does RRS stand for when talking about S3?
Amazon RDS DB snapshots and automated backups are stored in
In the Amazon cloudwatch, which metric should I be checking to ensure that your DB Instance has enough free storage space?
Can you create IAM security credentials for existing users?

choicegroup.choice: Yes, existing users can have security credentials associated with their account.
No, IAM requires that all users who have credentials set up are not existing users
No, security credentials are created within GROUPS, and then users are associated to GROUPS at a later time.
Yes, but only IAM credentials, not ordinary security credentials.

problem.p: You must increase storage size in increments of at least _____ %
What is the maximum key length of a tag?
Groups can’t _____.
Changes to the backup window take effect ______.
What does Amazon SWF stand for?
Using Amazon CloudWatch’s Free Tier, what is the frequency of metric updates which you receive?
If I write the below command, what does it do? ec2-run ami-e3a5408a -n 20 -g appserver

choicegroup.choice: Start twenty instances as members of appserver group.
Creates 20 rules in the security group named appserver
Terminate twenty instances as members of appserver group.

problem.p: Fill in the blanks: Resources that are created in AWS are identified by a unique identifier called an __________
Which is the default region in AWS?
What are the two types of licensing options available for using Amazon RDS for Oracle?

choicegroup.choice: Role based License and License Included

problem.p: When you view the block device mapping for your instance, you can see only the EBS volumes, not the instance store volumes.

choicegroup.choice: Depends on whether you use API call

problem.p: Can I control if and when MySQL based RDS Instance is upgraded to new supported versions?
What does Amazon EC2 provide?

choicegroup.choice: A platform to run code (Java, PHP, Python), paying on an hourly basis.
Physical servers, remotely managed by the customer.

problem.p: If I modify a DB Instance or the DB parameter group associated with the instance, should I reboot the instance for the changes to take effect?
Amazon SWF is designed to help users…

choicegroup.choice: … Coordinate synchronous and asynchronous tasks which are distributed and fault tolerant.

problem.p: What are the Amazon EC2 API tools?

choicegroup.choice: They don’t exist. The Amazon EC2 AMI tools, instead, are used to manage permissions.
Command-line tools to the Amazon EC2 web service.
They are a set of graphical tools to manage EC2 instances.
They don’t exist. The Amazon API tools are a client interface to Amazon Web Services.

problem.p: By default, EBS volumes that are created and attached to an instance at launch are deleted when that instance is terminated. You can modify this behavior by changing the value of the flag_____ to false when you launch the instance
True or False: When using IAM to control access to your RDS resources, the key names that can be used are case sensitive. For example, aws:CurrentTime is NOT equivalent to AWS:currenttime.
Will my standby RDS instance be in the same Region as my primary?
What are the initial settings of an user created security group?

choicegroup.choice: Allow all inbound traffic and Allow no outbound traffic
Allow no inbound traffic and Allow no outbound traffic
Allow no inbound traffic and Allow all outbound traffic
Allow all inbound traffic and Allow all outbound traffic

problem.p: What does Amazon Elastic Beanstalk provide?

choicegroup.choice: A scalable storage appliance on top of Amazon Web Services.
An application container on top of Amazon Web Services.
A service by this name doesn’t exist.
A scalable cluster of EC2 instances.

problem.p: When you run a DB Instance as a Multi-AZ deployment, the “_____” serves database writes and reads
